data.title: Double win for Mo at leadership awards
data.meta_description: A director at Bloc Digital has scooped two prizes at awards which recognise the region’s best leaders. Mo Suleman...
data.text:
A director at Bloc Digital has scooped two prizes at awards which recognise the region’s best leaders.

Mo Suleman, finance director at the Derby-based 3D content, data visualisation and alternative reality firm, was crowned Leader of the Year at this year’s East Midlands Leadership Awards, organised by TheBusinessDesk.com.

In front of an audience of 250 business owners and leaders, Mo was also named Finance Leader of the Year.

Other Marketing Derby Bondholders who took home prizes included Michael Treharne, of Sky Recruitment Solutions, who was named Young Leader of the Year, Matt Bonser, of Purpose Media, who carried off the Sales & Marketing Leader title and Matthew Crawford, of Embark Federation, who was crowned Public and Third Sector Leader.

Other shortlisted Bondholders included Stephen Salloway, of Salloway Property Consultants, Emma Tice, of Precept, Katy Upton, Fortitude Nicsa Global, Ellie Stephens, of Cubo, Bev Wakefield, of Vibrant Accountancy and Ann Bhatti, Connect Derby.

Sam Metcalf, Midlands editor at TheBusinessDesk.com, said: “Congratulations to all our shortlisted and winning business leaders.

“The judges had a heck of a job choosing who should come out on top – and I’d like to thank them all for their time, knowledge and expertise.
